Subject: DLP Agent is creating excessive cache in system Extern
Description:
Hi team, 

I'm opening a support case on behalf of the customer Easebuzz as they are experiencing the below issue described by the customer:

"DLP agents are making excessive cache in systems, and because of that, our systems are getting slow. We uninstalled the agent from a couple of systems and monitored it for a week, and no excessive cache file was there. Once we install the agent, we get the cache files in surplus.

Kindly please help us with that. We need a reason for that and a way to stop that from happening."

Thank you!
